name: cotton hexagon coasters
notes:
this pattern is part of the cotton hexagon collection, a set of four tableware items: coasters, table mats, place mats and a trivet.

make these cotton, hexagon shaped coasters from worsted weight, 100% cotton yarn.

they are a relaxing home decor crochet project, ideal for hand-made gifts or a quick make for selling at craft fayres.

these simple, modern coasters are crocheted in the round into a solid hexagon shape.  

the yarn chosen for this project is excellent quality, widely available and offered in lots of neutral, bright and pastel colours. added to this, the yarn is machine washable and dryable for easy care. 

perfect for beginners or if you are looking for a fast and easy project.
